title: Flexible Content Modules

fields.label: Flexible Content
fields.name: flexible_content
fields.instructions: Add flexible content modules to the page. Includes: ...

sub_fields.label: Hero Image
sub_fields.name: hero_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add the background image for the hero. Size: 2200px wide by 640px high.

sub_fields.label: Hero Title
sub_fields.name: hero_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add an alternative title to this hero banner or leave blank and just used the page title.

sub_fields.label: Video Link
sub_fields.name: video_link
sub_fields.instructions: Add the video link for the banner. We'll be using Cloudinary to host our videos so you need to upload it there first and grab the link from there.

sub_fields.label: Video Still Image
sub_fields.name: video_poster
sub_fields.instructions: Add the fall back image for this video. This should be a screenshot from the start of the video as it generally loads first then gets removed when the video loads.

sub_fields.label: Page Title
sub_fields.name: page_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a simple page title instead of a banner image or video.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Show Products
sub_fields.name: products_show
sub_fields.instructions: Choose to show a simple products grid of icons and title or the detailed products grid. This pulls directly from the Theme Settings > Products section.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: CTA Title
sub_fields.name: cta_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add the short call to action title.

sub_fields.label: CTA Button
sub_fields.name: cta_button
sub_fields.instructions: Add the text for the button

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: list_columns_title
sub_fields.instructions: Includes an optional title. Leave blank if not required.

sub_fields.label: Intro
sub_fields.name: list_columns_intro
sub_fields.instructions: Add a optional short intro. Leave blank if not required.

sub_fields.label: List Primary
sub_fields.name: list_primary
sub_fields.instructions: Add bullet point content to this column

sub_fields.label: List Secondary
sub_fields.name: list_secondary
sub_fields.instructions: Add bullet point content to this column

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: List Style
sub_fields.name: list_style
sub_fields.instructions: Choose to use bullet points or ticks for these lists.

sub_fields.label: Show Testimonials
sub_fields.name: show_testimonials
sub_fields.instructions: Choose to show a random selection of testimonials in a slideshow on this page. The content for this is pulled from the Testimonials menu.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Show Request a Demo btn
sub_fields.name: show_demo
sub_fields.instructions: Choose to show the 'Request a demo' button on this page.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional title for this section. Leave blank if not required.

sub_fields.label: Offerings
sub_fields.name: offerings
sub_fields.instructions: Add the different offerings for this module.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Choose from the available icons for this offering.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Background
sub_fields.name: background
sub_fields.instructions: Add a background colour for this section or leave white with dividing lines.

sub_fields.label: Offerings
sub_fields.name: offerings
sub_fields.instructions: Add the detailed offerings for this page.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Choose from the available icons for this offering.

sub_fields.label: Details
sub_fields.name: details
sub_fields.instructions: Add the details for this offering. Use bullet points to create a two column list on larger screens.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Offerings
sub_fields.name: offerings
sub_fields.instructions: Add the offerings for this product.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Choose from the available icons for this offering.

sub_fields.label: Details
sub_fields.name: details
sub_fields.instructions: Add the details for this offering.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Image size: 670px x 510px

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Embed a video into this page. First upload the video to YouTube/Vimeo account then copy the video link and paste in here. This will allow the video to be played directly within the page.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Show Latest News
sub_fields.name: show_news
sub_fields.instructions: Add two recent post from the news to this page.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Edit the title for this module.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Case Studies
sub_fields.name: case_studies
sub_fields.instructions: Add specific case studies to this page.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Edit the title for this module.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add space before or after this module.

choices.none: Remove all space before and after the module
choices.both: Add space before and after the module

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.default_value: Our Team … and a few of their favourite things

sub_fields.label: Team Members
sub_fields.name: team_members
sub_fields.instructions: Add team members to this page

sub_fields.label: LinkedIn
sub_fields.name: linkedin
sub_fields.instructions: Add a LinkedIn account (optional)

sub_fields.label: Portrait
sub_fields.name: portrait
sub_fields.instructions: Add the photo. Size 680px wide x 750px high

description: Adds the flexible content modules to the default template
